encyclopedia.content: Frozen 基本信息 片 名 ： 为你钟情 年 份 ： 2010 监 制 ： 郭子健， 严嘉仪 导 演 ： 郭子健 演 员 ： 文咏珊(Janice Man), 卫兰, 李治廷、刘浩龙, 邵音音, 狄龙,黎明锛執乇鹧莩鲲級 片 类 ： 奇幻/爱情 片 长 ： 分钟演职员表 演员表 职员表 内容梗概 居于美国的颖（卫兰 饰）一天误打误撞发现一个神秘机关，当机器打开后她发现一位年轻少女芝（文咏珊 饰）。颖后来得知这位年轻少女是自己母亲被吓了一跳，因她看上去比颖还要

entry.def: Frozen is the past participle of freeze.
If the ground is frozen it has become very hard because the weather is very cold.

example.ex: It was bitterly cold now and the ground was frozen hard.
example.tran: 现在天气冷极了，地面都冻硬了。

example.ex: ...the frozen bleakness of the Far North.

entry.def: Frozen food has been preserved by being kept at a very low temperature.

example.ex: Frozen fish is a very healthy convenience food.
example.tran: 冻鱼是非常健康的方便食品。

entry.tran: (人或身体某部位)冻坏的，冻僵的
entry.def: If you say that you are frozen, or a part of your body is frozen, you are emphasizing that you feel very cold.

example.ex: He put one hand up to his frozen face...
example.tran: 他用一只手捂在冰冷的脸上。

example.ex: I'm frozen to the bone out here.

entry.tran: (因非常担心、害怕等而)呆若木鸡的，一动不动的
entry.def: If you describe someone as frozen, you mean that their body is fixed in a particular position, for example because they are very worried or afraid.

example.ex: One boy, aged about 11, looks frozen with fright...
example.tran: 一个大约 11 岁的男孩吓得一动不动。

means.word_mean: 1. turned into ice; affected by freezing or by long and severe cold;
3. devoid of warmth and cordiality; expressive of unfriendliness or disdain;
5. used of foods; preserved by freezing sufficiently rapidly to retain flavor and nutritional value;
7. incapable of being changed or moved or undone; e.g. "frozen prices";

Sentence.sentence: Scientists agree that key player in this scenario is the West Antarctic ice sheet, a Brazil-size mass of frozen water that is much as 7000 feet thick.

sentences.en: Contrast fresh and frozen vegetables and you’ll find the fresh ones taste better.
sentences.cn: 把新鲜蔬菜和冰冻蔬菜对比,就会发现新鲜的吃起来味道好。

sentences.en: He gave his name to a well-known brand of frozen food.
sentences.cn: 他以自己的名字命名的冷冻食品成了名牌。

sentences.en: As he walked away towards his car she wanted to run after him, but she felt frozen, riveted to the spot.
sentences.cn: 他转身向车子走去时,她想追上去,但觉得自己的身体好像僵了,一步也挪不动。
